name: dexjs
description: dexjs : dexvis javascript visualization component library.

scripts.dex:jquery:css: shx cat css/jquery/*.css > dist/dex-jquery.css && shx cat dist/dex-jquery.css | cssmin > dist/dex-jquery.min.css
scripts.dex:bootstrap:css: shx cat css/bootstrap/*.css > dist/dex-bootstrap.css && shx cat dist/dex-bootstrap.css | cssmin > dist/dex-bootstrap.min.css
scripts.dex:css: shx cat css/dex/*.css > dist/dex.css && shx cat dist/dex.css | cssmin > dist/dex.min.css
scripts.css: npm run dex:css & npm run dex:jquery:css & npm run dex:bootstrap:css
scripts.dex:libs:js: browserify src/dex-libs.js --standalone dexlibs > dist/dex-libs.js && shx cat dist/dex-libs.js | uglifyjs > dist/dex-libs.min.js
scripts.dex:jquery:js: browserify src/dex-jquery.js --standalone dexjquery > dist/dex-jquery.js && shx cat dist/dex-jquery.js | uglifyjs > dist/dex-jquery.min.js
scripts.dex:bootstrap:js: browserify src/dex-bootstrap.js --standalone dexbootstrap > dist/dex-bootstrap.js && shx cat dist/dex-bootstrap.js | uglifyjs > dist/dex-bootstrap.min.js
scripts.dex:js: browserify src/dex.js --standalone dex > dist/dex.js && shx cat dist/dex.js | uglifyjs > dist/dex.min.js
scripts.build and deploy: npm run build && npm run deploy
scripts.deploy: npm run deploy-site & npm run deploy-dex
scripts.watch: shx echo QUICK WATCH IS BUILDING JS SOURCE... && watch "npm run build && echo DONE..." css src lib
scripts.watch-css: shx echo QUICK WATCH IS BUILDING CSS... && watch "npm run css && echo DONE..." css
scripts.watch-autodeploy: shx echo AUTODEPLOY WATCH IS BUILDING JS SOURCE... && watch "npm run build && npm run deploy && echo DONE..." css src lib
scripts.watch-quick: shx echo QUICK WATCH IS BUILDING JS SOURCE... && watch "browserify src/dex.js --standalone dex > dist/dex.js && echo DONE" src
